participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and fun-loving, enjoys reminiscing about childhood and expressing love for music and dance.
participant_1.background: I have a German Shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. My husband is adopted. I like to watch NHL hockey.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, focused on self-discovery and living in the moment. Values deep spiritual connections.
participant_2.background: I live in Alaska. I quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. I am a Buddhist. I have not spoken in three months. I like meditation.
